content: if you re looking for a fitted beanie for winter the lucky stars beanie is perfect it features the beautiful star stitch and is worked in continuous rounds the pattern offers instructions for the following sizes in both **messy bun** and **fitted** styles - infant - small child - child - teen/small adult - medium adult - large adult i have provided a video tutorial and written pattern for the free version infant size fitted style available on my website - https //emmeclairecrochet wordpress com/page/lucky-stars-beanie-infant-size/ i have provided detailed instructions for customising the beanie according to your yarn choice as well as many 8ply yarns worked up differently during the testing phase a huge thank you to the wonderful ladies who tested this pattern <3
